mapper.select: select * from trip_review order by review_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into trip_review (review_title, user_id, wwhere, wwhen1, wwhen2, wwith, expence, contents) values (#{review_title}, #{user_id}, #{wwhere}, #{wwhen1}, #{wwhen2}, #{wwith}, #{expence}, #{contents})
mapper.update: update trip_review set review_title = #{review_title}, user_id = #{user_id}, wwhere = #{wwhere}, wwhen1 = #{wwhen1}, wwhen2 = #{wwhen2}, wwith = #{wwith}, expence = #{expence}, contents = #{contents} where review_num = #{review_num}
